title: Celebrities are Buying Crypto (Bitcoin to $60,000!) - Last Week Crypto
description:
This is another episode of a weekly cryptocurrency news series called Last Week Crypto.

We cover the latest global news stories affecting the cryptocurrency markets January 31st through February 6th of 2021.
